<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impossible Volley](/Feats.aspx?ID=426) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=59) (Level 20)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a ranged weapon with the volley trait and reload 0.

</column>

---

You fire a volley at all foes in an area. Make one Strike with a –2 penalty against each enemy within a 10-foot-radius burst centered at or beyond your weapon’s volley range. Roll the damage only once for all targets.

 Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but do not increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.
name: Impossible Volley
requirement: You are wielding a ranged weapon with the volley trait and reload 0.
